evaandtheplanet

Travel | Drone | Photo | Video

I'm Eva, a professional travel photographer and content creator traveling full-time with my drone, always in search of the most breathtaking landscapes to capture. 

I am constantly fascinated by the endless possibilities of creating photos and videos from an aerial perspective. Whether I'm flying the drone above majestic mountains, exploring lush green jungles, or capturing the serenity of a remote island, I  strive to create visually stunning content that inspires and captivates.

As a professional travel photographer and content creator, I am committed to delivering high-quality visuals that will grab your audience's attention.

see my work

 

Why work with me

Since leaving my old job in 2021, I have fully committed myself to creating high-quality and inspiring aerial content, working with brands that share my values.

With years of experience working with clients in various industries, I understand the importance of building personal connections. That's why collaborating with me is not only professional but also fun and easy-going.

Whether you're looking to promote your destination, hotel, or brand, I am dedicated to delivering visually stunning content that showcases your unique story and values.

Lets have a chat on how we can work together to create amazing aerial content that captures the essence of your brand or destination.

@SeaScape Sailing

Eva joined us for one of our 8-day sailing adventures around southern Thailand.

She took some absolutely incredible footage, and turned it into media clips which still attract tons of attention on our social media channels.

Eva is also fun, easy-going and flexible to work with. Highly recommended!


Diane, Owner of SeaScape Sailing
